SELECT b1.project_id as project_id, b1.task_name as task_name, concat( group_concat(b2.task_name ORDER BY length(b2.task_path) SEPARATOR '_'), if((b1.start_time IS NOT NULL) OR (b1.end_time IS NOT NULL), concat(' ','进度计划：',date_format(b1.start_time, '%Y/%m/%d'),' — ',date_format(b1.end_time, '%Y/%m/%d')),'')) as task_full_name, b1.node_name as node_name, ifnull(b3.user_name,ifnull(b4.nick_name,b4.user_name)) as user_name, date(b1.complete_time) AS complete_date FROM ( SELECT a3.project_id as project_id, #{nodeName} AS node_name, #{companyUserId} AS company_user_id, #{completeTime} AS complete_time, a3.task_path AS task_path, a3.task_name AS task_name, a4.start_time AS start_time, a4.end_time AS end_time FROM (SELECT * FROM maoding_web_project_process_node WHERE status = 0 AND id = #{id}) a1 INNER JOIN maoding_web_project_member a2 ON (a2.deleted = 0 AND (a2.target_id = a1.id or a2.node_id = a1.id)) INNER JOIN maoding_web_project_task a3 ON (a3.task_status != '1' AND a3.id = a2.node_id) LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_process_time a4 ON (a3.id = a4.target_id) ORDER BY a4.create_date DESC LIMIT 1 ) b1 INNER JOIN maoding_web_project_task b2 ON (POSITION(b2.id IN b1.task_path)) INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_user b3 ON (b3.id=b1.company_user_id) INNER JOIN maoding_web_account b4 ON (b4.id=b3.user_id) LIMIT 1

mapper.sql: SELECT ifnull(#{id},a1.id) as id, ifnull(#{projectId},a1.project_id) as project_id, if(a1.task_type=2 and a3.task_id is null,0,a1.task_type) as task_type, ifnull(#{taskName},a1.task_name) as task_name, concat_ws('_',GROUP_CONCAT(a2.task_name ORDER BY length(a2.task_path) SEPARATOR '_'),ifnull(#{taskName},a1.task_name)) as task_full_name, ifnull(#{startTime},a1.start_time) as start_time, ifnull(#{endTime},a1.end_time) as end_time, ifnull(#{completeDate},a1.complete_date) as complete_date FROM ( SELECT id,task_type,task_name,task_path,project_id,complete_date,start_time,end_time FROM maoding_web_project_task WHERE task_type=#{taskType} AND id=#{id} LIMIT 1 ) a1 INNER JOIN maoding_web_project_task a2 on (a2.id!=a1.id and POSITION(a2.id IN a1.task_path)) LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task_relation a3 on (a3.task_id=a1.id)

SELECT a1.id as id, a1.project_id as project_id, if(a1.task_type=2 and a3.task_id is null,0,a1.task_type) as task_type, a1.start_time as start_time, a1.end_time as end_time, a1.task_name as task_name, GROUP_CONCAT(a2.task_name ORDER BY length(a2.task_path) SEPARATOR '_') as task_full_name FROM ( SELECT id,task_type,task_name,task_path,project_id,is_operater_task,start_time,end_time FROM maoding_web_project_task WHERE task_status!='1' AND id=#{id} LIMIT 1 ) a1 INNER JOIN maoding_web_project_task a2 on (POSITION(a2.id IN a1.task_path)) LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task_relation a3 on (a3.task_id=a1.id)

SELECT a1.id as id, a1.project_id as project_id, if(a1.task_type=2 and a3.task_id is null,0,a1.task_type) as task_type, a1.task_name as task_name, a1.start_time as start_time, a1.end_time as end_time, GROUP_CONCAT(a2.task_name ORDER BY length(a2.task_path) SEPARATOR '_') as task_full_name FROM ( SELECT id,task_type,task_name,task_path,project_id,is_operater_task,start_time,end_time FROM maoding_web_project_task WHERE task_status!='1' AND id=#{taskId} LIMIT 1 ) a1 INNER JOIN maoding_web_project_task a2 on (POSITION(a2.id IN a1.task_path)) LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task_relation a3 on (a3.task_id=a1.id)

SELECT a1.id as id, a1.project_id as project_id, if(a1.task_type=2 and a3.task_id is null,0,a1.task_type) as task_type, a1.start_time as start_time, a1.end_time as end_time, a1.task_name as task_name, GROUP_CONCAT(a2.task_name ORDER BY length(a2.task_path) SEPARATOR '_') as task_full_name, a1.complete_date as complete_date, a1.company_id as company_id, a1.org_id as org_id FROM ( SELECT id,task_type,task_name,task_path,project_id,complete_date,company_id,org_id,start_time,end_time FROM maoding_web_project_task WHERE task_status!='1' AND id=#{targetId} LIMIT 1 ) a1 INNER JOIN maoding_web_project_task a2 on (POSITION(a2.id IN a1.task_path)) LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task_relation a3 on (a3.task_id=a1.id)

SELECT task_id, group_concat(concat(node_name,'：',members) SEPARATOR ' ') as members FROM ( SELECT task_id,node_name, group_concat(DISTINCT user_name ORDER BY seq SEPARATOR ' ') AS members FROM (SELECT a1.node_id AS task_id, ifnull(a2.user_name, ifnull(a3.nick_name, a3.user_name)) AS user_name, a1.member_type AS member_type, (CASE a1.member_type WHEN 4 THEN '设计' WHEN 5 THEN '校对' WHEN 6 THEN '审核' ELSE a1.member_type END) as node_name, a1.seq AS seq FROM ( SELECT node_id,member_type,company_user_id,seq FROM maoding_web_project_member WHERE deleted = 0 AND node_id = #{id} ) a1 INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_user a2 ON (a2.id = a1.company_user_id) INNER JOIN maoding_web_account a3 ON (a3.status = '0' AND a3.id = a2.user_id) ) b1 GROUP BY task_id,member_type ORDER BY task_id,member_type ) c1 GROUP BY task_id

SELECT task_id, group_concat(concat(node_name,'：',members) SEPARATOR ' ') as members FROM ( SELECT task_id,node_name, group_concat(DISTINCT user_name ORDER BY seq SEPARATOR ' ') AS members FROM (SELECT a1.node_id AS task_id, ifnull(a2.user_name, ifnull(a3.nick_name, a3.user_name)) AS user_name, a1.member_type AS member_type, (CASE a1.member_type WHEN 4 THEN '设计' WHEN 5 THEN '校对' WHEN 6 THEN '审核' ELSE a1.member_type END) as node_name, a1.seq AS seq FROM ( SELECT node_id,member_type,company_user_id,seq FROM maoding_web_project_member WHERE deleted = 0 AND node_id = #{taskId} ) a1 INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_user a2 ON (a2.id = a1.company_user_id) INNER JOIN maoding_web_account a3 ON (a3.status = '0' AND a3.id = a2.user_id) ) b1 GROUP BY task_id,member_type ORDER BY task_id,member_type ) c1 GROUP BY task_id

SELECT task_id, group_concat(concat(node_name,'：',members) SEPARATOR ' ') as members FROM ( SELECT task_id,node_name, group_concat(DISTINCT user_name ORDER BY seq SEPARATOR ' ') AS members FROM (SELECT a1.node_id AS task_id, ifnull(a2.user_name, ifnull(a3.nick_name, a3.user_name)) AS user_name, a1.member_type AS member_type, (CASE a1.member_type WHEN 4 THEN '设计' WHEN 5 THEN '校对' WHEN 6 THEN '审核' ELSE a1.member_type END) as node_name, a1.seq AS seq FROM ( SELECT node_id,member_type,company_user_id,seq FROM maoding_web_project_member WHERE deleted = 0 AND node_id = #{targetId} ) a1 INNER JOIN maoding_web_company_user a2 ON (a2.id = a1.company_user_id) INNER JOIN maoding_web_account a3 ON (a3.status = '0' AND a3.id = a2.user_id) ) b1 GROUP BY task_id,member_type ORDER BY task_id,member_type ) c1 GROUP BY task_id

SELECT a1.id as id, a2.id as company_id, if((a3.depart_name is null),a2.company_name,concat(a2.company_name,'(',a3.depart_name,')')) as company_name FROM ( SELECT id,company_id,org_id FROM maoding_web_project_task WHERE task_status!='1' and ((task_type=2 AND id = #{id}) OR (task_type=3 AND be_modify_id=#{id}) OR (task_type=4 AND be_modify_id=#{id})) LIMIT 1 ) a1 INNER JOIN maoding_web_company a2 on (a2.status='0' and a1.company_id=a2.id) LEFT JOIN maoding_web_depart a3 on (a3.status='0' and a1.org_id=a3.id and a1.company_id=a3.company_id)

SELECT a1.id as id, a2.id as company_id, if((a3.depart_name is null),a2.company_name,concat(a2.company_name,'(',a3.depart_name,')')) as company_name FROM ( SELECT id,company_id,org_id FROM maoding_web_project_task WHERE task_status!='1' and ((task_type=2 AND id = #{taskId}) OR (task_type=3 AND be_modify_id=#{taskId}) OR (task_type=4 AND be_modify_id=#{taskId})) LIMIT 1 ) a1 INNER JOIN maoding_web_company a2 on (a2.status='0' and a1.company_id=a2.id) LEFT JOIN maoding_web_depart a3 on (a3.status='0' and a1.org_id=a3.id and a1.company_id=a3.company_id)

SELECT cost_detail.id as id, cost_point.fee_description as point_name, cost_type.type as point_type, (case cost_type.type when '1' then '合同回款' when '2' then '技术审查费' when '3' then '合作设计费' else '其他' end) as point_type_name, convert(cost_point.fee_proportion,decimal(5,2)) as point_rate, cost_point.fee as point_cost, #{fee} as detail_cost FROM maoding_web_project_cost_point_detail cost_detail inner join maoding_web_project_cost_point cost_point on ( cost_point.status = '0' and cost_point.id = cost_detail.point_id ) inner join maoding_web_project_cost cost_type on ( cost_type.status = '0' and cost_type.id = cost_point.cost_id ) where cost_detail.status = '0' and cost_detail.id = #{id} LIMIT 1

SELECT a.id as id, c.fee_description as point_name, c.type as point_type, (case c.type when '1' then '合同回款' when '2' then '技术审查费' when '3' then '合作设计费' else '其他' end) as point_type_name, convert(c.fee_proportion,decimal(5,2)) as point_rate, c.fee as point_cost, b.fee as detail_cost, #{fee} as paid_cost, #{payDate} as pay_date, ifnull(d.nick_name,d.user_name) as pay_user_name, #{paidDate} as paid_date, ifnull(e.nick_name,e.user_name) as paid_user_name FROM ( SELECT id,fee,point_detail_id,create_by,update_by,pay_date,paid_date FROM maoding_web_project_cost_payment_detail WHERE status='0' and id=#{id} LIMIT 1 ) a INNER JOIN maoding_web_project_cost_point_detail b on (b.status='0' and a.point_detail_id=b.id) INNER JOIN maoding_web_project_cost_point c on (c.status='0' and b.point_id=c.id) LEFT JOIN maoding_web_account d on (d.status='0' and a.create_by=d.id) LEFT JOIN maoding_web_account e on (e.status='0' and a.update_by=e.id) LIMIT 1

SELECT a.id as id, group_concat(DISTINCT b.design_range ORDER BY b.seq SEPARATOR ' ') as ranges, group_concat(DISTINCT c.name ORDER BY c.seq SEPARATOR ' ') as functions, a.contract_date as sign_date FROM ( SELECT * FROM maoding_web_project WHERE pstatus='0' and id=#{id} ) a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_design_range b on (b.status='0' and a.id=b.project_id) LEFT JOIN maoding_data_dictionary c on (position(c.id in a.built_type)) LIMIT 1
